DOC.brief_summary: This randomize control 2 year trial Camp Pendleton , CA determine whether complementary medicine intervention ( Healing Touch Guided Imagery , HT+GI ) reduce Posttraumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) symptom compare treatment usual ( TAU ) return combat-exposed active duty military significant PTSD symptom . Secondary aim evaluate effect HT GI measure depression , hostility , general health status population .
DOC.brief_title: Healing Touch & Guided Imagery Posttraumatic Stress Disorder Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: The study enrol 123 active duty subject Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton Southern California least one symptoms PTSD .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female male subject 18 year old 2 . Postdeployment combat zone 3 . Identified postdeployment health reassessment PTSD symptoms 4 . Referred Camp Pendleton 5 . Subjects willing sign consent 6 . Subjects willing participate length study Exclusions : 1 . Female subject pregnant nursing 2 . Subjects receive heal touch use guided imagery source 3 . Subjects major health condition may interfere participate study
